name: mods
description: List the Minecraft mods that ThePoultryMan has made.
title: ThePoultryMan's Mods

fields.body:
Speeds up the growth rate of crops, and saplings, when it's raining.
[Modrinth](https://modrinth.com/mod/crops-love-rain)

Adds cute and friendly pigeons to Minecraft that can be tamed by the player.
[Modrinth](https://modrinth.com/mod/pleasant-pigeons)

Allows the player to place lanterns on walls.
[Modrinth](https://modrinth.com/mod/lanterns-bow)
